posts.post_content:
Selling these HOFers for what I have into them.  Let me know if you have any questions.  Cost includes shipping via USPS first class with delivery confirmation and insurance.

Payment Paypal Money Owed or Money order or Check (will wait for it to clear).

Detailed scans can all be seen in this photobucket album:

[url]http://s1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/FOR%20SALE%20-%20T206/[/url]

Cards not sold below are all on ebay (auctions starting at .99, ending next Sunday night, April 3rd).  

[url]http://shop.ebay.com/jaybirdjane/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=&_trksid=p3686[/url]

Hey Guys,

There have been a lot of responses.  I'll respond to them in a first come first served manner.  Sorry if I take a bit.  Have a family commitment this morning.  I'll try and get everyone responded to this morning.

Thanks,

jason

Updated the pending sales and sold cards.  Thanks for looking.  I won't bump this again for a week.

IF ANYONE HAS ANY T206 JACK QUINN cards, please let me know.  I would be very open to working a trade for any of the HOFers that are still on the board.


Thanks,

Jason

[quote name="Jaybird" post=879755]Updated the pending sales and sold cards.  Thanks for looking.  I won't bump this again for a week.

IF ANYONE HAS ANY T206 JACK QUINN cards, please let me know.  I would be very open to working a trade for any of the HOFers that are still on the board.


Thanks,

Hi Jason,

If this Quinn catches your interest, please let me know if it can be credited as part of a trade towards any of your cards for sale.  Fantastic front, though with paper loss on the back.  E-mail better than PM for me.

Thanks,
--S

[IMG]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/_xAPkPXpAcrw/TPAW4axgRTI/AAAAAAAABPI/4gyvQaLhzhw/s400/T206%20Quinn%20%282%29%20-%20front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/_xAPkPXpAcrw/TPAW4rUCFwI/AAAAAAAABPQ/aJGEd2-KnRQ/s400/T206%20Quinn%20%282%29%20-%20rear.jpg[/IMG]

Hey Shaun,

I appreciate the offer.  I'm really collecting these for the back set, so this card doesn't hold much interest for me.  If you come across any other Quinns, let me know.  

I'm always open to other trade offers as well.  It never hurts to ask.  Especially non-T206 type cards for my type collection.  

Thanks,

Jason
The remaining cards are on ebay ending next Sunday night.
